title: can we implement this into ranked
body:
So i am tired of loosing because i forget to change my summons or someone else forgets to change summons, 
i was thinking of adding to the pre que a summons ablities to each postion you choose so when you find a match game the summons are already there
just incase you forget to change them possible do this for masteries as well 

from a person who is tired of loosing from such a stupid mistake
{{summoner:7}} {{summoner:7}} {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:14}}

replies.body: I agree with this i have the same problem ;)
Lmao was i supposed to understand what you said in this post orrrrrrrrr
Hahaha your jungler forget smite did they? XD
